definition: a sense of having been through good times and bad/a weathered and worn look
to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~

sentences.english: She has a long history, but also changes everyday.
sentences.chinese: 又有歷史的滄桑感，但是又在日新月異的變化。

sentences.english: What a feeling of vicissitudes of history?
No wonder this place makes me feel a sense of history.
sentences.chinese: 你別說，這裏真的有一點兒歷史的滄桑感。

sentences.english: She has a long history, but has changes everyday.
sentences.chinese: 她又有歷史的滄桑感，但是又在日新月異的變化着。
